messages.message: Search query not working on prod. This is a search that has worked previously. The placement and wording of "summarizing progress" is confusing. I would expect it to say something like "Searching" and in line where the response will be generated cc: @margaret.tomaszczuk
Tried again scoping down to HR drive and got another wrong response :sweat_smile:
I got this answer too the other day:

@mfichman Is there a way we can verify whether the below link was used to mount HR drive within ib-internal org?

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0ALQghXdTXq8GUk9PVA
Yes, that is the folder I mounted for the HR drive. To confirm, you can look at the drive filter in the mount details:
We can also query the DB and spot-check document URLs as needed. Lmk if you need help with that.

@jayasooryan Seeing similar issue as the one reported by @maggie.hafers

Some findings: There is one relevant document that explain about the India's PTO in a smaller section. When I query against the Human resources drive, I am getting the response from India benefit document.
